show_name: Chō Gekijōban Keroro Gunsō 2: Shinkai no Princess de Arimasu! (movie 2)
other_title: Sargento Keroro: Keroro y la princesa de los mares (Spanish)
超劇場版 ケロロ軍曹２ 深海のプリンセスであります！ (Japanese)
超劇場版KERORO軍曹2 深海的公主 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: During a vacation Natsumi is visited by a female alien and a male alien, she later gains feelings for. They then get encounted by a summoned mystious creature.
ending_theme: "Sono Te wo Tsunaide" (その手をつないで) by Misato Watanabe
